name: Major Apartment Building Collapse - Thessaloniki
description: A 7-story residential apartment building in central Thessaloniki has suffered catastrophic structural collapse. The building housed approximately 80 residents across 35 apartments. Early morning collapse has trapped most residents inside. Initial reports indicate multiple casualties with many people trapped in rubble. Structural engineers report high risk of progressive collapse. Adjacent buildings have been evacuated due to structural concerns. This is an urban search and rescue emergency requiring specialized teams and equipment.

available_actions.name: Immediate Surface Victim Rescue
available_actions.description: Focus on rescuing victims on or near the surface of debris, establish safe working zones, prevent secondary collapse during rescue

available_actions.name: Systematic Debris Removal and Deep Rescue
available_actions.description: Deploy heavy equipment for systematic debris removal, create access points for deep rescue, shore up unstable sections

available_actions.name: Priority Void Space Search and Rescue
available_actions.description: Use specialized sensors, cameras, and canine units to locate survivors in void spaces, execute precision rescues in viable voids

available_actions.name: Emergency Structural Stabilization
available_actions.description: Priority stabilization of remaining structure and adjacent buildings, prevent progressive collapse, create safe rescue environment

available_actions.name: Comprehensive Urban Search and Rescue Response
available_actions.description: Integrated approach: immediate surface rescue, void space search operations, systematic debris removal, structural stabilization, mass casualty medical response, family assistance center, investigation team

additional_concerns: Survivors trapped in confined spaces - oxygen limited
Dense urban area limits heavy equipment access
Family members on scene creating safety issues
